dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 5220 IH: Don’t Tax Higher Education Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Delaney (for himself and Mr. Byrne) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the excise tax on investment income of private colleges and universities.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Don’t Tax Higher Education Act.

section.header: Repeal of excise tax on investment income of private colleges and universities

subsection.text: Chapter 42 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking subchapter H (and by striking the item relating to such subchapter in the table of subchapters for such chapter).
The amendments made by this section shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2017.
